pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing relinquishment
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:0.5_0: The training rule on trading with money
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.12_0: “... Foolish men, how can you trade with money in various ways?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.13_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.14_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.15.1_0: ‘If a monk trades with money in various ways, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.2_0: At that time the monks from the group of six traded with money in various ways.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.3_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.4_0: “How can the Sakyan ascetics trade with money in various ways? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.5_0: The monks heard those people complaining,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.6_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.7_0: “How can the monks from the group of six act like this?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.8_0: After criticizing those monks in many ways, they told the Buddha ...
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:1.9_0: “Is it true, monks, that you do this?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.10_0: what is shaped in a lump is what is meant.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.11_0: What is both shaped and not shaped:
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.14_0: a golden _kahāpaṇa_ coin, a copper _māsaka_ coin, a wooden _māsaka_ coin, a resin _māsaka_ coin; whatever is used in comerce.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.16_0: if he exchanges what is shaped with what is shaped, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.17_0: If he exchanges what is not shaped with what is shaped, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.18_0: If he exchanges what is both shaped and not shaped with what is shaped, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.19_0: If he exchanges what is shaped with what is not shaped, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.20_0: If he exchanges what is not shaped with what is not shaped, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.21_0: If he exchanges what is both shaped and not shaped with what is not shaped, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.22_0: If he exchanges what is shaped with what is both shaped and not shaped, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.23_0: If he exchanges what is not shaped with what is both shaped and not shaped, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.24_0: If he exchanges what is both shaped and not shaped with what is shaped, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.25_0: The goods should be relinquished in the midst of the Sangha,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.26_0: “And, monks, it should be relinquished like this. ...
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.27_0: After approaching the Sangha, that monk should put his upper robe over one shoulder and pay respect at the feet of the senior monks. He should then squat on his heels, put raise his joined palms, and say,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.28_0: ‘Venerables, I have traded with money in various ways.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.2_0: and you have the same kind of perception ...
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.30_0: I relinquish them to the Sangha.’
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.31_0: ”After relinquishing it, he is to confess the offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.32_0: A competent and capable monk should receive confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.39_0: He should point out a fruit,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.41_0: If he makes a purchase and brings back what is allowable, everyone may enjoy it except the one who did the exchange into money.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.42_0: If the other goes, all is well.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.43_0: If not, they should be told,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.45_0: If he throws it out, that’s good.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.46_0: If he doesn’t throw a monk who has five qualities, then appointed him should be appointed.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.47_0: he is not swayed by desire, ill will, confusion, or fear, and he knows who is and is not supervised.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.48_0: “And, monks, this is how it should be appointed.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.49_0: First a monk should be asked
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.4_0: ... The monks who have been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.50_0: A competent and capable monk should then inform the Sangha:
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.51_0: ‘Sir, let the Saṅgha listen to me.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.52_0: If it seems appropriate to the Sangha, the Sangha should appoint monk so-and-so as money.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.54_0: Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.55_0: The Sangha appoints monk so-and-so as money.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.56_0: Any monk who approves of appointing monk so-and-so as a deception to carry his money should remain silent.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.57_0: Any monk who doesn’t approves should speak up.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.58_0: The Sangha has appointed monk so-and-so as a trader.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.59_0: The Sangha agrees and is therefore silent.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.61_0: The monk who has been appointed should take the patterns.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.62_0: If he prompts the sign, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.63.1_0: If it is money, and he perceives it as such, and he exchanges it into money, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.64_0: If it is money, but he is unsure of it, and he exchanges it into money, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.65_0: If it is money, but he does not perceive it as such, and he exchanges it into money, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.66_0: If it is not money, but he perceives it as such, and he exchanges it into money, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.67_0: If it is not money, but he is unsure of it, and he exchanges it into money, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.68_0: If it is not money, and he does not perceive it as such, but he exchanges it into money, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.69_0: If it is not money, but he perceives it as such, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.6_0: what is shaped, what is not shaped, and what is both shaped and not shaped.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.70_0: If it is not formless, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.71_0: If it is not formless, and he does not perceive it as such, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.75_0: The ninth rule, the training rule on trading with money, is finished.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:2.8_0: what is meant for the head, what is meant for the neck, what is meant for the hands, what is meant for the feet, what is meant for the waist.
